target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the KVM hypervisor where the STCv VM will be instantiated

hostname.title: VM Hostname
hostname.description: Hostname to apply to the STCv VM

target_server_type.title: Target Server type
target_server_type.description: Type of hypervisor environment into which the instance will be created

mgmt_ip.title: VM Management IP
mgmt_ip.description: IP address to apply to the management interface of the STCv VM

mgmt_gateway.title: VM Management Gateway
mgmt_gateway.description: IP address of the network gateway for the management interface of the STCv VM

mgmt_ip_prefix.title: Management Network Prefix Length
mgmt_ip_prefix.description: Network prefix length for the STCv management interface

mgmt_bridge.title: Management Bridge
mgmt_bridge.description: Bridge to connect the management interface of the STCv VM

data_bridge1.title: Data Bridge 1
data_bridge1.description: Bridge to connect the first data interface of the STCv VM

data_bridge2.title: Data Bridge 2
data_bridge2.description: Bridge to connect the second data interface of the STCv VM

stcv_destination_image_path.title: Image path
stcv_destination_image_path.description: Path to the STCv qcow2 image on the target server

vcpus.title: VM VCPUs
vcpus.description: Number of vCPUs to apply to the STCv VM

ram.title: VM RAM
ram.description: Amount of RAM to apply to the STCv VM
